thread.title: WATCH LIVE: Milo Yiannopoulos Holds Press Conference Following Disinvitation from CPAC
thread.title_full: WATCH LIVE: Milo Yiannopoulos Holds Press Conference Following Disinvitation from CPAC

author: Mediaite TV
title: WATCH LIVE: Milo Yiannopoulos Holds Press Conference Following Disinvitation from CPAC
text:
WATCH LIVE: Milo Yiannopoulos Holds Press Conference Following Disinvitation from CPAC by Mediaite TV | 1:58   
Milo Yiannopoulos is holding a press event in New York City today, where he will address the fallout from his recent controversy concerning his remarks about pedophilia. Yiannopoulos will reportedly take questions during this event, which will most likely concern his rescinded invitation to CPAC , his canceled book deal , and his current status as a tech editor for Breitbart . 
The conference will begin at 3 p.m. EST. 
Watch above, via Mediaite TV. 
[image via screengrab] 
Have a tip we should know? Follow Mediaite
